title: Scorpions - Classic Bites (2002)
description:
Classic Bites is Scorpions' heavy metal compilation album with real melodies. Vocals are superb. The heavier tracks are perfectly supported by the ballads which are pure genius - Under the Same Sun, Lonely Nights, Send Me an Angel are beautiful tracks which deserve to be heard by a larger audience than they have had. This album is worth getting for those 3 tracks alone - but in truth - the whole collection doesn't have a bad track on it.
[Source: Amazon.co.uk]

Release Year: 2002
Genre: Heavy Metal/Hard Rock

02. Alien Nation
03. Tease Me Please Me
